cases.title: Plant a Tree
cases.description: A community lost its shade after storms. Every $5 plants a sapling. Kids walk to school under the sun—your help grows a living canopy.

cases.title: Pediatric Cancer Care
cases.description: Maya (age 6) is starting chemo. Donations cover fuel cards for hospital trips and comfort kits so she isn’t facing treatment empty-handed.

cases.title: Emergency Shelter for a Family
cases.description: After a sudden eviction, the Hassan family is living in their car. Your gift buys three weeks of shelter so parents can get back to work.

cases.title: Clean Water Well
cases.description: Women in Kijani walk 4 miles daily for water. A village well turns hours of walking into minutes of learning and earning.

cases.title: School Lunch for a Month
cases.description: Hungry students can’t focus. $10 covers a child’s lunches for a month—a small lift that changes their whole day.
